Entry.EnglishText: Innkeeper

Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.EnglishText: Notice

Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: ベルサス・宿屋・食材屋
Entry.EnglishText: Belsas Inn - Grocery Store

Entry.JapaneseText: ベルサス・宿屋・食材屋
Entry.EnglishText: Belsas Inn - Grocery Store

Entry.JapaneseText: 宿屋・食材屋
Entry.EnglishText: Inn - Grocery Store

Entry.JapaneseText: そろそろ、その協議とやらの 時間だぜ。行くのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, it's about time for that conference to start. We going?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ…… 陛下の事が気になる……
Entry.EnglishText: Yes. I'm concerned for Her Majesty's well-being...

Entry.JapaneseText: 行こう。
Entry.EnglishText: Let's go.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマとの交渉とやらが そろそろ始まるぜ。 行かないのかい？
Entry.EnglishText: The meeting with the Gajuma is starting soon. Do you plan on going?

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマのお嬢さんよ、 そんなキレイな格好して よそから来たんだろ？
Entry.EnglishText: You have rather pretty clothes for a Gajuma. Are you from out of town?

Entry.JapaneseText: ここらをウロウロしないほうがいい。 早いとこ橋の向こうのガジュマ地区へ 行ったほうが身のためだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: You shouldn't dilly-dally around here. You should go to the Gajuma quarters on the other side of the bridge for your own safety.

Entry.JapaneseText: キレイなお連れさんだね。 恋人かい？
Entry.EnglishText: The girl accompanying you is rather pretty. Is she your girlfriend?

Entry.JapaneseText: な、なんだよ。 そんな目でニラむなよ…… ごゆっくり、どうぞ……
Entry.EnglishText: Wh-What's the matter? No need to scowl at me like that... Well, have a good day...

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、ガジュマ！ 寝床を汚すなよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, Gajuma! You'll get our rooms dirty!

Entry.JapaneseText: お出かけですか？ ごゆっくり、どうぞ……
Entry.EnglishText: Are you heading out? Please take care...

Entry.JapaneseText: いらっしゃい……
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome...

Entry.JapaneseText: いらっしゃいませ どんな御用でしょうか。
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome! How may I help you?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 泊まる 食材を買う 世間話をする やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Rest Buy Ingredients Talk Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: どうも……
Entry.EnglishText: I'll be seeing you...

Entry.JapaneseText: またのお越しを。
Entry.EnglishText: We hope to see you again.

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>ひと晩<unk17:340C80>ガルドになりますが いかがですか？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>One night is <unk17:340C80> Gald. Would you like to stay the night?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>一泊<unk17:340C80>ガルドになりますが、 お泊りですか？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>One night is <unk17:340C80> Gald. Would you like to stay here?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002><unk17:340C80>ガルドになりますが、 お泊りですか？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>One night is <unk17:340C80> Gald. Will you be spending the night?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>一泊<unk17:340C80>ガルドになりますが、 お泊りですか？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>One night is <unk17:340C80> Gald. Would you like to stay here?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>一泊<unk17:340C80>ガルドになりますが、 お泊りですか？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>One night is <unk17:340C80> Gald. Would you like to stay here?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>泊まんのかい……？ <unk17:340C80>ガルド置いてきな。
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>One night is <unk17:340C80> Gald. Stay here?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>一泊<unk17:340C80>ガルドだけど、 泊まるかい？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>It's <unk17:340C80> Gald for a night. Will you be staying?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>一泊<unk17:340C80>ガルドになりますが、 お泊りですか？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>One night is <unk17:340C80> Gald. Would you like to stay here?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>一泊<unk17:340C80>ガルドになりますが、 お泊りですか？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>One night is <unk17:340C80> Gald. Would you like to stay here?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>一泊<unk17:340C80>ガルドになりますが、 お泊りですか？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>One night is <unk17:340C80> Gald. Would you like to stay here?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>一泊<unk17:340C80>ガルドだけど、 泊まる？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>One night is <unk17:340C80> Gald. Would you like to stay?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>一泊<unk17:340C80>ガルドになりますが、 よろしいでしょうか？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>One night is <unk17:340C80> Gald. Is that all right with you?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>一泊<unk17:340C80>ガルドになりますが、 お泊りですか？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>One night is <unk17:340C80> Gald. Would you like to stay here?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>一泊<unk17:340C80>ガルドだ。 どうする？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>One night is <unk17:340C80> Gald. Are you staying?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002><unk17:340C80>ガルドだけど泊まるかい？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>Spend <unk17:340C80> Gald to rest here?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002><unk17:340C80>ガルドだけど泊まるかい？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>Spend <unk17:340C80> Gald to rest here?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002><unk17:340C80>ガルドだけど泊まりますか？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>Will you spend <unk17:340C80> Gald to rest here?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002><unk17:340C80>ガルドだけど泊まりますか？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>Will you spend <unk17:340C80> Gald to rest here?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140><font:80000002><unk17:340C80>ガルドで泊りますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140><unk17:340C80> Gald to rest. Spend the night? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: ごゆっくりどうぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: Rest well.

Entry.JapaneseText: ごゆっくりお休みください。
Entry.EnglishText: Enjoy your stay.

Entry.JapaneseText: ごゆっくりお休みください。
Entry.EnglishText: Enjoy your stay.

Entry.JapaneseText: ごゆっくりお休みください。
Entry.EnglishText: Enjoy your stay.

Entry.JapaneseText: ごゆっくりお休みください。
Entry.EnglishText: Enjoy your stay.

Entry.JapaneseText: ごゆっくり。
Entry.EnglishText: Rest well.

Entry.JapaneseText: ごゆっくりお休みください。
Entry.EnglishText: Enjoy your stay.

Entry.JapaneseText: ごゆっくりお休みください。
Entry.EnglishText: Enjoy your stay.

Entry.JapaneseText: ごゆっくりお休みください。
Entry.EnglishText: Enjoy your stay.

Entry.JapaneseText: ごゆっくり。
Entry.EnglishText: Rest well.

Entry.JapaneseText: ごゆっくりお寛ぎください。
Entry.EnglishText: Rest well.

Entry.JapaneseText: ごゆっくりお休みください。
Entry.EnglishText: Enjoy your stay.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうぞ、ごゆっくり。
Entry.EnglishText: Make yourself at home.

Entry.JapaneseText: ごゆっくり。
Entry.EnglishText: Rest well.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうぞ、ごゆっくり。
Entry.EnglishText: Make yourself at home.

Entry.JapaneseText: ごゆっくり、どーぞー。
Entry.EnglishText: Have a good rest!

Entry.JapaneseText: お金が足りないようですね。
Entry.EnglishText: You've got no money.

Entry.JapaneseText: お金が足りないようです。
Entry.EnglishText: It seems you don't have enough money.

Entry.JapaneseText: お金が足りないようです。
Entry.EnglishText: It seems you don't have enough money.

Entry.JapaneseText: お金が足りないようです。
Entry.EnglishText: It seems you don't have enough money.

Entry.JapaneseText: お金が足りないようです。
Entry.EnglishText: It seems you don't have enough money.

Entry.JapaneseText: 金がないのに、 泊まる気だったのかい？
Entry.EnglishText: What, did you think we'd let you stay here without paying?

Entry.JapaneseText: お金が足りないよ。
Entry.EnglishText: You don't have enough money.

Entry.JapaneseText: お金が足りないようです。
Entry.EnglishText: It seems you don't have enough money.

Entry.JapaneseText: お金が足りないようです。
Entry.EnglishText: It seems you don't have enough money.

Entry.JapaneseText: お金が足りないようです。
Entry.EnglishText: It seems you don't have enough money.

Entry.JapaneseText: お金が足りないみたいね。
Entry.EnglishText: It seems you don't have enough money.

Entry.JapaneseText: 泊まり賃をお持ちでないようですが。
Entry.EnglishText: It doesn't look like you can afford to stay here.

Entry.JapaneseText: お金が足りないようです。
Entry.EnglishText: It seems you don't have enough money.

Entry.JapaneseText: お金が足りないぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: You don't have enough money.
Entry.Notes: Check dupes Use to way "We're broke."

Entry.JapaneseText: あれ？ お金が足りないみたいだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Huh? You seem to not have enough money.

Entry.JapaneseText: お金が足りないんじゃが……
Entry.EnglishText: It appears you don't have enough money...

Entry.JapaneseText: お金が足りませんが……
Entry.EnglishText: You don't have enough money...

Entry.JapaneseText: お金が足らないんですけど……
Entry.EnglishText: You don't seem to have enough money...

Entry.JapaneseText: それでは またの機会に。
Entry.EnglishText: See you next time.

Entry.JapaneseText: またお越しください。
Entry.EnglishText: Please come again.

Entry.JapaneseText: またどうぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: Please come again.

Entry.JapaneseText: またお越しください。
Entry.EnglishText: Please come again.

Entry.JapaneseText: またお越しください。
Entry.EnglishText: Please come again.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ふん…… ひやかしかい……
Entry.EnglishText: Hmph... Window-shoppers...

Entry.JapaneseText: またおいで。
Entry.EnglishText: Come back any time.

Entry.JapaneseText: またお越しください。
Entry.EnglishText: Please come again.

Entry.JapaneseText: またお越しください。
Entry.EnglishText: Please come again.

Entry.JapaneseText: またお越しください。
Entry.EnglishText: Please come again.

Entry.JapaneseText: またおいで。
Entry.EnglishText: Come back any time.

Entry.JapaneseText: またのお越しを。
Entry.EnglishText: We hope to see you again.

Entry.JapaneseText: またお越しください。
Entry.EnglishText: Please come again.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだ、 泊まらないのか……？
Entry.EnglishText: What, you're not going to stay?

Entry.JapaneseText: いつでもどうぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: You're always welcome here!

Entry.JapaneseText: いつでもおいで。
Entry.EnglishText: Come back any time.

Entry.JapaneseText: お気をつけて……
Entry.EnglishText: Take care...

Entry.JapaneseText: 泊まらないんですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Do you not want to stay here?

Entry.JapaneseText: ただいま、サービス期間で、 買い物された方には ポテトサラダのサービスです。
Entry.EnglishText: At the moment, we're throwing in a free Potato Salad for those who purchase something from us.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>食べますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Take a bite? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>『<item:20000010>』を食べました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>Ate "<item:20000010>."

Entry.JapaneseText: うまい……
Entry.EnglishText: It's good...

Entry.JapaneseText: おいしい!! おいしいヨ!!
Entry.EnglishText: This is so good! It's so dang tasty!

Entry.JapaneseText: これはうまいな……
Entry.EnglishText: This is delicious...

Entry.JapaneseText: おいしい……
Entry.EnglishText: It's delicious...

Entry.JapaneseText: うめえぜ、 こいつぁ、五つ星だ！
Entry.EnglishText: Mmmm tasty! I rate it five stars!

Entry.JapaneseText: おいしいわね……
Entry.EnglishText: That was delicious...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>『<item:20000010>』のレシピを入手しました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>Obtained recipe for "<item:20000010>"!

Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.Notes: DON'T EDIT THIS, IT'S A DUMMY ENTRY

Entry.JapaneseText: どうも……
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you.

Entry.JapaneseText: またのお越しを。
Entry.EnglishText: We hope to see you again.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あんた、ベルサスに 何しに来たんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey... What are you doing in Belsas?

Entry.JapaneseText: ここはヒューマの街だぜ。 楽しく暮らしたければ、 他の街へ行きな！
Entry.EnglishText: This is a Huma town. If you want to live happily, then go somewhere else!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマと一緒に旅をしてるなんて、 珍しいっていうか、変な奴らだな。 ……っていうか、気に食わねえな。
Entry.EnglishText: I hardly ever see Huma traveling with Gajuma. You guys are pretty strange. I'm not a fan.
Entry.Notes: Check this line. We rewrote it Gator/Dragon/Kevin

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマのくせに 派手なモノ着てるな。 金持ちのガジュマが この街に何の用だ？
Entry.EnglishText: You're dressed rather well for a Gajuma. What sort of business does a rich one like you have in this town?

Entry.JapaneseText: いくら金持ちでも、 この街じゃ、ガジュマは いい思いはできないぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: It doesn't matter how rich you are, none of us here think all that highly of you Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: 恐い顔でにらむなよ！ ……あ、違うか。 ガジュマはみんな こういう顔だったな。
Entry.EnglishText: Don't make that scary face at me! ...Oh my mistake. All Gajuma have faces like that.

Entry.JapaneseText: 連れのガジュマも無愛想だが、 おまえらもみんな無愛想だな。 イヤな事でもあったのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Your Gajuma companion is unfriendly, but that seems to go for all of you. Did something bad happen?

Entry.JapaneseText: あんた、涼しい顔してるが、 ホントはこの街に ムカついてるんじゃないのか？
Entry.EnglishText: You're trying to look cool, but doesn't this town bother you?

Entry.JapaneseText: なんとなく感じるんだよな。 あんた、相当イラついてるってな。 オレに当たらないでくれよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I can tell. You seem pretty angry. Please don't hit me.

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえの仲間のガジュマ、 大丈夫なのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Your Gajuma friend is safe, right...?

Entry.JapaneseText: なんか、スッゲーイライラ してるような気がするぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm feeling pretty annoyed for some reason.

Entry.JapaneseText: 明日、ガジュマとの話し合いが あるんだってな…… ジャンニのやつ、来るのか……？
Entry.EnglishText: I hear there is going to be a meeting with the Gajuma tomorrow... I wonder if Gianni is going to come...?

Entry.JapaneseText: あ、ジャンニってのは、 昔、よく遊んだガジュマだよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, Gianni's this Gajuma I used to play with back in the day...

Entry.JapaneseText: もうトモダチじゃねえし、 別に会いたいわけでも ないけどな……
Entry.EnglishText: But she's not my friend anymore. It's not like I want to see her again...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマとの話し合いか…… 昔はオレも、ジャンニってダチと よく話をしたな……
Entry.EnglishText: A meeting with the Gajuma... I used to talk with my friend Gianni a lot way back in the day...

Entry.JapaneseText: いや、別に、 懐かしいわけじゃないぜ…… オレはガジュマなんか……
Entry.EnglishText: It's not like I'm feeling nostalgic or anything... I don't really like Gajuma...

Entry.JapaneseText: オ、オレ……女王様の演説で 昔の事、思い出したよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Th-The Queen's speech made me recall the good old days...

Entry.JapaneseText: なんでガジュマの事、嫌いに なっちまったんだろうな…… わかんねえよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Why did I start hating Gajuma... I honestly don't know...

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近、時々、ガジュマたちが こっちの地区にも顔を出すように なったんだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: Lately, sometimes Gajuma have been coming over to this side of town...

Entry.JapaneseText: 顔を合わせるのが恐いっていうか、 どうしたらいいのかわからないって いうか……な……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm too scared to look them in the eye... Or maybe it's more like I don't know what to do...

Entry.JapaneseText: この前、ジャンニと話をしたよ…… あいつも色々大変そうだ……
Entry.EnglishText: I talked to Gianni not too long ago... She's been through a lot...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの事を許せない奴らが 大勢いるんだってさ…… 仕方ない……よな……
Entry.EnglishText: Apparently a lot of people can't bring themselves to forgive Huma... I guess it can't be helped...

Entry.JapaneseText: なんなんだろうな、この音。 なんとなーくイヤな感じがする。
Entry.EnglishText: Just what is this noise? I don't like the sound of it!

Entry.JapaneseText: オレ、ジャンニに協力する事を 約束したんだ……種族の対立を なくすためにさ……
Entry.EnglishText: I promised Gianni that I would help her to end the racial conflicts.

Entry.JapaneseText: あいつ、すっごく嬉しそうな 顔してたよ……いい顔してた。
Entry.EnglishText: She looked so happy... I was glad to see her like that...

Entry.JapaneseText: その時、思ったよ。 オレたちは同じ<Yellow>ヒト<White>なんだってな。
Entry.EnglishText: At that time, I got to thinking... She is my fellow <Yellow>Human<White>...

Entry.JapaneseText: 昔はよくガジュマとも 遊んだな……
Entry.EnglishText: I used to play with Gajuma back in the day...

Entry.JapaneseText: いや、別にそれがよかったとか、 そういう事じゃなんだぜ？
Entry.EnglishText: But it's not like it was something I enjoyed, or anything...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『ドリナの樹』 美しいグリーンの観葉植物。 宿屋の主人の趣味で、宿屋内は グリーン系で統一されている。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Drina Shrub - A beautiful verdant houseplant. Fond of green, the innkeeper has decorated the inn in green tones.
